summary: Add Phase 3: a 3D Walkthrough game mode with PUBG-style joystick movement, interactive room surfaces that open the existing Mini Sidebar, and a visible realistic 3D house.
architectural_notes: Phase 3 introduces a 3D walkthrough mode that reuses the Phase 1 Mini Sidebar UI for interactions on 3D surfaces (walls/floors).

existing_features.title: Ensure the 3D Walkthrough mode is fully usable as the default 3D experience: render a visible, realistic 3D house/interior with stable lighting, shadows, and materials so that walls/floors/furniture are clearly readable in dark UI context.

Add/ensure PUBG-style on-screen joystick movement for 3D Walkthrough mode: joystick must control forward/back/strafe movement smoothly with a small deadzone, and it must be available in 3D mode (including non-touch devices), while still supporting existing WASD + mouse-look controls.

In 3D Walkthrough mode, clicking any room wall or floor surface must open the same Mini Sidebar used elsewhere (SmartRoomSidebar) by setting the active room selection state; surface clicks should select the correct room when possible and otherwise select a sensible default room.

Make the 3D scene data flow consistent with the selected/active room: device fetching, mapped device hotspot rendering, lighting fixtures, and navigation bounds must respect the current active room selection (and teleport target), not a hardcoded room id.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement 3D Walkthrough mode (Phase 3) with a visible, realistic 3D house environment.
Add PUBG-style on-screen joystick controls for movement in 3D Walkthrough mode.
In 3D mode, clicking any room wall or floor opens the same Mini Sidebar from Phase 1.

projectName: Phase 3: 3D Walkthrough mode with PUBG-style joystick and clickable room surfaces opening the Mini Sidebar
